articles.title: ‘I had goosebumps’: Djokovic energised by return of fans - The Age
articles.description: The world No.1  got a taste of what was to come at the Australian Open when he played an exhibition match in Adelaide after coming out of quarantine on Friday.
articles.content:
World No.1 Novak Djokovic found playing without crowds last season strange and he cant wait to wow the fans in the stands at his 17th Australian Open.
